text: Kim Young-sam (December 20, 1927 â€“ November 22, 2015) was the President of the South Korea from February 25, 1993 to February 25, 1998. He was born in Geoje, South Gyeongsang. When elected in 1992, he became the first civilian to become president in over 30 years. Kim died in a hospital in Seoul, South Korea from heart failure caused by a blood infection, aged 87.Former President Kim Young- sam dies at age 87 == References == == Other websites == * Official profile from the Office of the President of the Republic of Korea * Britannica Student Encyclopedia: Kim Young Sam Category:1927 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Presidents of South Korea
title: Kim Young-sam
